snippet: An expansion team called the Browns made its debut in 1999, but the connection with the team’s past will probably, like Cleveland itself, never be the same.
abstract: Cheering Section article by author Mark Winegardner reflects on the death of NFL team owner Art Modell, and considers the impact on Cleveland Browns fans; Modell moved the franchise to Baltimore in 1995, drawing the wrath of many Browns faithful.
lead_paragraph: An expansion team called the Browns made its debut in 1999, but the connection with the team’s past will probably, like Cleveland itself, never be the same.

headline.main: A City’s Heartbreak Outlives Its Source
headline.print_headline: A City’s Heartbreak Outlives Its Source
